Package io.janusproject.kernel.space

Classes and tools for implementing spaces in the Janus platform.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DistributedSpace
    Represents an space in which the messages may be distributed other the network.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractEventSpace
    Abstract implementation of an event space.
    EventSpaceImpl
    Default implementation of an event space.
    EventSpaceSpecificationImpl
    Default implementation of the specification of an event space.
    OpenEventSpaceSpecificationImpl
    Default implementation of the specification of an event space.
    RestrictedAccessEventSpaceImpl
    Default implementation of a restricted-access event space.
    RestrictedAccessEventSpaceSpecificationImpl
    Default implementation of the specification of a restricted-access event space.
    SpaceBase
    Abstract implementation of a space.

Package io.janusproject.kernel.space Description

Classes and tools for implementing spaces in the Janus platform.
